resources.string: 1. What is Deoxyribonucleic acid commonly referred to as?
2. What process involves treating rubber with sulfur to harden it?
3. Name two different organelles of a eukaryotic cell.
4. This word describes the force that pulls objects to the middle of the earth?
5 What type of trees yield the resin used to produce turpentine?
6. Cumulus and Cirrus are types of what?
7. Which two planets have one or more moons?
8. Where in the human body would you find the scaphoid bone?
9. Which grow upwards Stalactites or Stalagmites?
10. What process involves heating an ore to obtain a metal?
